  • Live Well

Think of us as your doggie concierge. Manage it all in one place, quickly and effortlessly.

As dog parents, we understand that every dog is unique; from their diet, habits, personalities, lifestyles, breed and more. So why are we stuck with generalized health tips and archaic blogs on how to care for them?

We make pet ownership simple for you, so you can spend more time them.

Barker is currently in live Beta. Looking to keep up with our pack? Become an early member here. We will keep you up to date with product development, community events, exclusive shopping drops and more.
